settings.title: Selecting Your Finish
settings.content:
From walls, floors and ceilings to furniture, baseboards and sheds, Farrow & Ball's range of eco-friendly paint finishes can help you transform almost any surface in your home (and outside it, too).

Need help deciding on the perfect finish for your project?

Help with Finishes & Additional Product Information

*Note: 100mL Sample Pots are only available in Estate Emulsion

settings.title: The Farrow & Ball System
settings.content:
For a covetable and long-lasting finish, we recommend following our simple three coat paint system:

One coat of our Primer & Undercoat in the recommended tone.

Our Primers & Undercoats are formulated with the same highest quality ingredients as our paint, helping you create a rich and lasting finish - even on difficult surfaces.

Two coats of your selected color to build up an extraordinary depth.

Our paint is blended with only the highest quality ingredients and richest pigment levels to closely guarded formulations. Itâ€™s what gives our hues an unmatchable depth and exceptional coverage.

As one of the first to offer a 100% water based range, Farrow & Ball paints are low odor, eco-friendly and safe to use in every room of your home. A water base ensures our paint is easy to apply and dries in just two hours - simply wash brushes with warm soapy water after use.

settings.title: Shipping & Returns
settings.content:
Please note that delivery times are estimates only and are not guaranteed, due to circumstances out of our control. Please bear this in mind when arranging appointments for decorators.

Paint orders will be delivered within 3 - 5 working days. In stock items are available for same day store pickup.

Returns of unopened and re-saleable items will be accepted for refund or exchange, less a 25% restocking fee within 14 days of purchase, if accompanied by a valid proof of purchase.

We are sorry that we cannot accept sample pots, wallpaper, archive colors, special orders for refund or exchange.
